column1: Legend: Comparison of 13 mattress configurations over 8-hour simulation. Baseline: Standard Foam. APM = Alternating Pressure Mattress.
Legend: Negative = improvement (reduction). Positive for Surface/DTI = longer time to injury (improvement).
Legend: Statistical tests comparing mattress performance groups.
Legend: DTI Efficiency = (DTI Time / Baseline) × 100%. Damage Reduction = (1 - Damage/Baseline) × 100%.
